mapper.select: SELECT vtpm.id, IF(vtpm.union_id IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) hasUnion, vul.user_id FROM vika_third_party_member vtpm LEFT JOIN vika_user_link vul ON vtpm.union_id = vul.union_id AND vul.type = 1 WHERE vtpm.app_id = #{appId} AND vtpm.type = #{type} AND vtpm.open_id = #{openId}

SELECT vu.id userId, vtpm.id, vtpm.mobile, IF(vul.id IS NULL, 0, 1) hasLink FROM vika_user vu LEFT JOIN vika_user_link vul ON vu.id = vul.user_id AND vul.type = 1 LEFT JOIN vika_third_party_member vtpm ON vtpm.union_id = vul.union_id AND vtpm.app_id = #{appId} WHERE vu.mobile_phone = #{mobile} AND vu.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY vtpm.type LIMIT 1
